com.xorprogramming.ui

Class CheckableImageButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • android.widget.ImageButton
          • com.xorprogramming.ui.CheckableImageButton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.widget.Checkable

    public class CheckableImageButton
extends android.widget.ImageButton
implements android.widget.Checkable
    An ImageButton that adds the ability to be checked or not. In a layout, the is_checked property can be used to check or uncheck the button.
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Steven
